instruction: Please analyze the impact of COVID-19 crises on various credit sectors based on the exhibited data.
output: Based on the data, so far, the information technology and health care sectors have been least affected by the COVID-19 crisis, while energy and financial companies have seen a significant widening of their spreads. Our stress test suggests that these trends may continue, with energy and financial companies likely to be impacted the most, and information technology and health care sectors least affected.
